item.title: Github API: Fetch issues with exceeds rate limit prematurely
item.description: 1 Q 2 A 2.1 Basic authentication 2.2 Using personal access tokens 本文为摘录，原文为： https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33655700/github-api-fetch-issues-with-exceeds-rate-limit-prematurely 1 Q I am building an app that fetches the issues and pull requests of over 1K github repos, like this. $ curl -i "https://api.github.com/repos/user/repo/issues?state=closed" My problem is that, after the initial 60 iterations I get a rate limit error: { "message": "API rate limit exceeded for
